titleStmt.title: A lette[r] from a gentleman in the country, to a member of the House of Commons in England; in reference to the votesof the 14th of December, 97. Relating to the trade of Ireland. Together with an answer to the said letter. / By Sir F. B.
titleStmt.author: F. B.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed for Patrick Campbel; and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn, tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Trinty College (Dublin, Ireland) Library.
